pages.text: This dainty ring has it all: with the help of a little (or a lot!) of [#](d6658f)Pink Ink[#](), it strengthens you from the inside out and grants you additional hearts.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Infuse it with [Pink Ink](book://magic/ink) in a [Color Picker](book://magic/color_picker) to increase the amount of extra hearts provided.
